# Interface IntentMatchInterface

Information about matched intent with a confidence score.

Contains the name of the matched intent and its confidence score (0.0 to 1.0).

interface IntentMatchInterface {  
name: string;  
score: number;  
}

##### Index

### Properties

name score

## Properties

### name

name: string

Name of the matched intent.

### score

score: number

Confidence score (0.0 to 1.0).
